so they dont make the conflict be aboht somthing that happened before the last time they interacted
summary: This might be a bit of a stretch and I'm not saying that I ship it, but what if Jonah is slowly developing a crush on Buffy and...
question: This might be a bit of a stretch and I'm not saying that I ship it, but what if Jonah is slowly developing a crush on Buffy and Jonah is angry at Tj for bullying her? It's most definitely and hopefully about the panic attacks but I think this might be situation we should discuss?
answer: That’s an interesting idea and at this point I don’t think I’ve seen any other theories stating that. I’d say it could be possible especially with the juffy they gave us in episodes six. The main thing holding this prediction back for me is the fact that Jonah is with Libby at the moment and I don’t really think he’d get into a relationship with a girl when he has a crush on a different one. Unless maybe he liked both of them at the same time-but if that was the case, whatever feelings he had for Buffy would kinda go away after getting a girlfriend I think. But I’m always open for new ideas to speculate on so thank you!

summary:
So I have a sort of convoluted theory as why Jonah is mad at TJ:
I always found it weird how Jefferson’s didn't have a girls...
body:
So I have a sort of convoluted theory as why Jonah is mad at TJ:

I always found it weird how Jefferson’s didn’t have a girls basketball team but it did have a ultimate team which is a considerable less popular sport, probably because Jonah’s convinced the previous principal to create his team, so what if Dr. Metcalf cut the funds for the ultimate team, they probably have money issues even with the school support if they needed to raise money selling pancakes, to give them to the girls basketball team. So Jonah blames TJ because if he hadn’t treated Buffy the way he did, she wouldn’t have created the girls basketball team and the ultimate team would have keep their funds.

That plus Libby dumping him make him snap.

summary: Watching swingset 2.0 with my younger brother who's 11, even he could see the gay. Dare I ask if we've been too harsh on Disney?...
question: Watching swingset 2.0 with my younger brother who's 11, even he could see the gay. Dare I ask if we've been too harsh on Disney? jk but seriously every time I tell myself not to get my hopes up and remember Disney probably wont give us cannon Tyrus till the final episode (even then only an ambiguous subtext version) and sure as hell won't give us a kiss, they  give us scenes like that. Disney if you are listening, an 11 year old boy saw the gay as was like "so what". GIVE US THE GAY WE DESERVE
answer: They’re always surprising me, either way honestly. I can’t predict what Disney is okay with anymore, times are changing…AND NO ONE CARES IF THEYRE GAY. Kids just see a cute couple that like each other and just NEED.TO.KISS.  (or at least talk about how hard theyre both pining)

reblog.comment: They’re always surprising me, either way honestly. I can’t predict what Disney is okay with anymore, times are changing…AND NO ONE CARES IF THEYRE GAY. Kids just see a cute couple that like each other and just NEED.TO.KISS.  (or at least talk about how hard theyre both pining)

summary: samann whatever and their clan can hate on tyrus and tj all the want, but hating on josh and calling him “rush foolery” is...
question: samann whatever and their clan can hate on tyrus and tj all the want, but hating on josh and calling him “rush foolery” is seriously wrong and immature. these people claim they are the mature people in this situation yet they spend their days hating on a 16yr old actor. wtf.
answer: I love how people in the comments are defending her and justifying her behavior. Especially someone who’s saying they were mostly “harmless jokes”. I remember a lot of those posts, and a general majority of them were bashing Josh’s talent, blaming his ‘messiness’ on being the reason he and his cast mates aren’t really ‘friends’, belittling how much he cared about playing this LGBT role, and even went as far as saying Cyrus should be played by an actor who’s actually ‘gracious’ enough to play the role and one that genuinely cares about their fans. All of these posts were made by an adult about a 16 year old minor, and she was publishing harmful thoughts and opinions about him in the wide open spaces of the Internet for all to see. Anyone had access to those posts, and if she and her posse don’t realize how detrimental those posts really were at their core, then I’m glad they were deleted off of Tumblr.

All of these posts were made by an adult about a 16 year old minor, and she was publishing harmful thoughts and opinions about him in the wide open spaces of the Internet for all to see. Anyone had access to those posts, and if she and her posse don’t realize how detrimental those posts really were at their core, then I’m glad they were deleted off of Tumblr.

I remember a lot of those posts, and a general majority of them were bashing Josh’s talent, blaming his ‘messiness’ on being the reason he and his cast mates aren’t really ‘friends’, belittling how much he cared about playing this LGBT role, and even went as far as saying Cyrus should be played by an actor who’s actually ‘gracious’ enough to play the role and one that genuinely cares about their fans. All of these posts were made by an adult about a 16 year old minor, and she was publishing harmful thoughts and opinions about him in the wide open spaces of the Internet for all to see. Anyone had access to those posts, and if she and her posse don’t realize how detrimental those posts really were at their core, then I’m glad they were deleted off of Tumblr.
trail.content: I love how people in the comments are defending her and justifying her behavior. Especially someone who’s saying they were mostly “harmless jokes”. I remember a lot of those posts, and a general majority of them were bashing Josh’s talent, blaming his ‘messiness’ on being the reason he and his cast mates aren’t really ‘friends’, belittling how much he cared about playing this LGBT role, and even went as far as saying Cyrus should be played by an actor who’s actually ‘gracious’ enough to play the role and one that genuinely cares about their fans. summary:
TJ: Honey bun?
Cyrus: Yes?
TJ, blushing: I meant, would you like one?
Cyrus: Oh. Yeah, sure. Sugar?
TJ: Yes?
Cyrus, also...
body:
TJ: Honey bun?
Cyrus: Yes?
TJ, blushing: I meant, would you like one?
Cyrus: Oh. Yeah, sure. Sugar?
TJ: Yes?
Cyrus, also blushing: I was just asking if you wanted some sugar in your tea.
TJ, flustered: Oh! Yeah. Sure.
Both: *completely flustered*
Buffy, from a distance: Even I'm getting embarrassed from watching them.
Andi: I think I know what you mean.

dialogue.name: TJ, blushing
dialogue.label: TJ, blushing:
dialogue.phrase: I meant, would you like one?

dialogue.name: Cyrus, also blushing

summary: still waiting for a tyrus hug or possibly even kiss if disney is ok with a "yes this is homo" kiss
question: still waiting for a tyrus hug or possibly even kiss if disney is ok with a "yes this is homo" kiss
answer:
cant wait for my tyrus kiss with a giant Coopi promo on top of it 😍😍

or they have some kinda weird parallel where Andi kisses Jonah and is like ‘its a friendship kiss, friends kiss platonically all the time!’ and then tyrus kiss so it’s like: hmmmmmmm platoniccc 

No I’m just kidding lmao but idk i think a hug is very possible, especially for episode 11 when he’s comforting Cyrus.. We got a lot to go still! Anything is possible imo from this point on, I never expected to get that swing scene with as much tension as it had..
